It works just fine.  I ran it on win7 x64.  Just mount or burn the iso, disconnect from the net and start the program.  It will time out and let you continue without registration.  once you get through that part you can reconnect to the net again.

Great upload. I was having a problem because the quick time I had was newer version. I uninstalled and reinstalled the one on the disc. logged off internet and opened file and it works perfect. Thanks and I will seed for a few days.

Instead of disconnecting your internet everytime you run the app, you could add this to your hosts file or similar: 127.0.0.1 www.askvideo.com
Of course, you wouldn't be able to browse the site unless you #comment out or remove the line again.
